name: WaterSense Low-Flow Showerhead
description: 2.0 GPM EPA WaterSense certified. Saves ~12,000 gallons/year for a family of four (≈45,000 L).

name: Faucet Aerator Pack
description: 1.5 GPM aerators cut sink use by ~30%. Typical household saves ≈26,000 L/year.

name: Dual-Flush Conversion Kit
description: Converts existing tank to dual-flush. Average savings ≈54,000 L/year per household.

name: Smart Leak Detector
description: Wi‑Fi leak + freeze alerts. Avoids small leaks that waste ~3,000 gallons/year (≈11,000 L).

name: Drip Irrigation Starter Kit
description: Delivers water at roots; reduces outdoor use by up to 50%. ≈150,000 L/year for 200 m² garden.

name: Soil Moisture Sensor Controller
description: Skips irrigation when soil is wet. Typical savings ≈50,000 L/season for lawns.

name: Rain Barrel Kit (200L)
description: Harvest rainwater for gardens. 200 L barrel can offset ≈20,000 L/year in many climates.

name: Greywater Laundry Diverter
description: Routes washing machine water to irrigation where permitted. Saves ≈90,000 L/year.

name: Pressure-Regulating Valve
description: Reduces excessive flow and prevents overwatering in household systems.

name: Smart Irrigation Controller
description: Weather-aware irrigation scheduling for lawns and gardens.

name: Mulch Pack (50m²)
description: Organic mulch reduces evaporation and maintains soil moisture.

name: Efficient Sprinkler Heads (10x)
description: Low-drift, efficient spray patterns to cut outdoor water waste.
